full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Project Title**: Line Painting Services Standing Offer, CFB Winnipeg, Manitoba

**Reference Number**: WS4031769109-Doc4164129114 Amendment 2

**Tender Status**: Expired

**Bid Submission Deadline**: September 25, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) issues this bid solicitation to select a supplier for Line Painting Services Standing Offer at CFB Winnipeg, Manitoba. This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number WS4031769109 (Doc4031907478), dated July 19, 2023, with a closing of August 9, 2023, at 14:00 EDT.

**Notice of Amendment**
------------------------

A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation. AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the new closing time of 2:00 PM EDT on September 25, 2023.

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The selected supplier shall provide skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, supervision, transportation, administration, and material as requested by Department of National Defence (DND) in the form of call-ups for Line Paint services at CFB Winnipeg, MB. Services are to be provided on an "as required" basis. It is anticipated that only 1 firm will be issued a standing offer.

**Terms of the Standing Offer**
-------------------------------

The standing offer will be issued for a term of two (2) years with three (3) consecutive one (1) year option periods.
